mapper.insert: insert into t_member(userid, userpw, username, gender, phone, zipcode, address1, address2) values (#{userid},#{userpw},#{username},#{gender},#{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_member where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update t_member set userpw = #{userpw}, username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1},address2 = #{address2} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select userid, userpw, username ,verify from t_member where userid=#{userid} and userpw=#{userpw}
